title: Let Me Love You
lyrics:
I'm feelin' the pressure
I'm feelin' the weight of what they do
They're making decisions
Pulling me further from my truth
I'm stuck on a mission
When all I wanna do is be with you

Be with you



My mind stops racing

When I hold you tight

Forget about all the things they say for just one night

So touch me reckless

And don't be shy

And show them forever baby

You are mine



All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

All I wanna do is hold you

They don't understand

All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

It's my right to love you

Love you, love you



Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you



Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you



(?) a religion

By over a thousand year old man

They start a petition

To find out who can take what hand

They start a comotion

When all I wanna do is be with you

Be with you



But we'll still face it

Every time

We got enough is us to last a thousand lives



So kiss me reckless

And don't be shy

Just show them forever baby

You are mine



All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

All I wanna do is hold you

They don't understand

All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

It's my right to love you

Love you, love you



Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you



Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you



All I wanna do is love you

In every way, every way

That I can



All I wanna do is hold you

With no rules

It's my right to love you

Love you, love you



All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

All I wanna do is hold you

They don't understand

All I wanna do is love you

In every way I can

It's my right to love you

Love you, love you



Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you



Baby let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Let me, let me love you

Love you, love you
